definition: beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]
appreciation of the finer things in life

sentences.english: Adorno attempts to build real nature aesthetics.
sentences.chinese: 阿多諾力圖建立真正的自然美學。

sentences.english: Wang Guowei is the founder of China's modern aesthetic.
sentences.chinese: 王國維是中國現代美學的奠基者。

sentences.english: PUGILISTS and aesthetes are not necessarily in opposing corners.
sentences.chinese: 拳擊家和美學家未必就湊不到一塊兒。

sentences.english: In the third place, the article is to expound the current significance of Lin Yutang's esthetic thought of life art.
sentences.chinese: 三是闡發林語堂生活藝術論美學思想的當下意義。

sentences.english: Its structure function and its esthetics characteristic should be embodied.
sentences.chinese: 橋樑建築首要滿足其結構功能，還要體現其美學特性。

sentences.english: Feminine cinema aesthetics is undoubtedly a great contribution to the cinematographic art of this century.
sentences.chinese: 女性電影美學無疑是對百年的電影藝術的一大貢獻。

sentences.english: On the Life Aesthetics "Calling for Soul" and "Nine Songs";
sentences.chinese: 論《招魂》《九歌》的生命美學。

sentences.english: The third chapter is the historical contribution and impact of Lu Cheng's aesthetic thinking.
sentences.chinese: 第三章，呂澄美學思想的歷史貢獻及影響。

sentences.english: Aesthetics only gets you so far.
sentences.chinese: 美學只能帶你走那麼遠。

sentences.english: The urban esthetics history, a branch of esthetics, whose content covers widely.
sentences.chinese: 城市美學是一門內容涵蓋面十分廣泛的美學分支。

sentences.english: The urban esthetics history, a branch of esthetics, whose content covers widely.
sentences.chinese: 城市美學是一門內容涵蓋面十分廣泛的美學分支。

sentences.english: Esthetically, its nucleus is the relationship between ideal and friendliness.
sentences.chinese: 從美學角度研究禮樂，它的核心是美與善的關係。

sentences.english: The beauty of cherry flowers and military arts give rise to the aesthetics view of Japanese people.
sentences.chinese: 櫻花的美，武士道等導致了日本人死的美學觀。

sentences.english: Thirdly, the main content of Gehong's eco-aesthetics thought.
sentences.chinese: 葛洪生態美學的主要內容。

sentences.english: Satre s aesthetics of nothingness was included in his philosophy of nothingness.
sentences.chinese: 薩特早期哲學中內含的美學是一種虛無論美學。

sentences.english: Satre s aesthetics of nothingness was included in his philosophy of nothingness.
sentences.chinese: 薩特早期哲學中內含的美學是一種虛無論美學。

definition: appreciation of the finer things in life
practice/to put into practice/to live up to (a promise)/to carry out (a project)
to construct (often sth abstract, such as good relations)/to set up/to develop/construction (abstract)/architecture
to crane one's neck/to await eagerly/to lead/to show the way
to pass on (to future generations)/passed on (from former times)/a continued tradition/an inheritance
to interpret/to comment and explain/to annotate/to perform (i.e. interpret a theatrical role)/to decode/interpretation/annotation
